      • registerEnhancementsForItem

        public static java.util.List<net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation> registerEnhancementsForItem(net.minecraft.item.Item item)
        Registers the ResourceLocations for the icons for every possible upgrade for the provided item.
        Parameters:
        item - The item that can take enhancements.
        Returns:
        A list of all registered resource locations for the item.
